meta.title: Air Quality Solutions for Bank | Financial Institutions | Prana Air
meta.description: Prana Air provides air quality solutions of pollution monitoring and fresh air for banks and financial institutions.

animalCare.title: Air quality Solutions for Animal care

banner.title: Air quality solutions for
banner.description: A complete solution for air monitoring air purification and data monitoring for banks and other financial institutions.

pollutants.title: Major Air
pollutants.description: Due to the diverse nature of air pollutants present in a bank setting precaution and mitigation strategies have become a challenge. To prevent bad air quality it is critical to monitor air quality and take appropriate precautions to avoid poor air quality episodes.

pm25.title: PM2.5
pm25.description: These are fine particles of dust and water that are suspended in the air.

co2.title: CO2
co2.description: Depends on the number of people in the room and its ventilation rate.

tvoc.title: TVOC
tvoc.description: Cleaning agents markers tobacco smoke etc. emit TVOC

noise.title: Noise
noise.description: Noise levels rises when large number of customers are present.

odor.title: Odor
odor.description: Sweaty customers & public washrooms release bad odor

microbial.title: Microbial Pollutants
microbial.description: Microbiological contaminants spread easily in closed spaces.

risk.title: Who are at
risk.description: People in the bank/financial institutions experience stuffiness in the air as the occupancy rate increases and there is poor ventilation. Customers and staff are exposed to other air pollutants like PM2.5 TVOC etc.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: Customers comfort level highly depend on the air quality inside your bank.

banker.title: Banker
banker.description: High risk of developing lung cancer etc. are some of the health effects

cashiers.title: Cashiers
cashiers.description: Lack of attention & coordination a high risk of respiratory infections.

manager.title: Manager
manager.description: Poor judgment inaptness more prone to make bad decisions

solutions.title: Air quality
solutions.description: Prana Airs air quality monitoring and air purifying solutions give you the power to know what your customers and staff breathe and what you could do to clean the air to make banks/financial institutions air pollution-free zone and view and analyze your IAQ.

monitors.title: Sensible+ Air Monitor
monitors.description: This is a smart air quality monitor that comes with 7 inch touch screen display that gives more insightful data for banks.
monitors.knowMoreAriaLabel: Know More about Sensible+ Air Monitor
monitors.imgAlt: prana air sensible+ air quality monitor for banking services

freshAir.title: Fresh Air Machine As IAQ Solution
freshAir.description: One-stop solution for indoor air pollution by Prana Air Fresh Air Machine working as an air purifier with the capability to filter out 99.5% efficiency and multi-layer HEPA filters.

features.item2: Compact Design makes it easy to place

freshAir.knowMoreAriaLabel: Know More about Fresh Air Machine
freshAir.imgAlt: prana air fresh air machine as iaq solution for banks

apiData.title: AQI API Data
apiData.description: Avail the real-time air quality data of nearby outdoor area on the web.

features.item1: Integrate air quality data on the web
features.item3: Take precautions from the air pollution

dataServices.title: Data Freemium
dataServices.description: The data can be displayed or analyzed on the LCD screens or the app via our customized dashboard. Scan the QR to know the AQI of the area you are in.

airPollutionEffects.title: The Effects of Air Pollution -
airPollutionEffects.description: When customers & staff members are exposed to poor air quality they feel unwell and irritation in the eyes nose and throat headaches and nausea are common symptoms of air pollution exposure.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: About Air Quality Solution for Bank/Financial Institutions Have questions? Were here to help.

clientele.title: Our
clientele.description: We are honored to work with so many well-known companies.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Please help us know what requirements you have. Our team will contact you very soon.

industrialApplications.title: Industrial
industrialApplications.description: Regardless of how small or large a business is, Prana Air offers a wide choice of Smart, affordable, and highly accurate air quality solutions for various industries.
